title.rendered: 2018 Vendor Registration opens first week of May!

content.rendered:
How to Sign Up

2018 Vendor registration opens first week of May. Please email us atÂ SecondSundayOnMain@gmail.comÂ to be added to our vendor list. You will be emailed once registration is open.Â 

Please note that we do not send out letters of acceptance since we are non-juried. All final details regarding day-of information will be sent out theÂ weekÂ ofÂ the event each month. Questions can be emailedÂ to theÂ Event Organizer.

Help us spread the word!Â Like us on FacebookÂ and let people know youâ€™ll be there.

 

Event Information

2018 Event Dates:Â June 10, July 8, August 12, September 9, and October 14

Time:Â 12 PM â€“ 5 PM

Second Sunday on Main is a FREE neighborhood street festival in Cincinnatiâ€™s historic neighborhood of Over-The-Rhine. This monthly celebration is produced by Main Street OTR in collaboration with the Over-The-Rhine Chamber of Commerce.

Each month from June to October, an estimated 3,000 visitors attend SSOM each month to explore Main Streetâ€™s 40+ participating shops, galleries, restaurants, cafes, and bars and more than 100 vendors.

This year Second Sunday on Main celebrates its 13th anniversary. With support from amazing local businesses and organizations, this terrific event continues to grow connect the OTR community each year. Second Sunday on Main is more than a street festival, itâ€™s a community event that brings neighbors together. Itâ€™s a fun place to hang out with friends, a hub to meet your OTR neighbors, Â a fun event for families to relax, platform for great local music, and an incubator for aspiring entrepreneurs to sell their goods.
